titles.title: To revise, codify, and enact without substantive change certain general and permanent laws, related to public contracts, as title 41, United States Code, "Public Contracts".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 5/10/2004--Introduced. Enacts title 41 of the United States Code into positive law to be entitled "Public Contracts." Makes technical and conforming changes to existing law.
